title: What is the latest iPod Touch generation? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 7th generation. Sporting a 4 core Apple A10, 2GB of RAM and between 32 and 256 GB of storage. (32/128/256 to be exact) It sports the SAME 4 inch body, with better display, ample 1300mAh battery. (For an iPod touch that’s a lot given it’s dimensions)
